abstract: News Analysis; decision by Defense Dept to allow women to serve in combat roles has left one last discrepancy between military's treatment of two sexes, namely that women are not required to register for selective service; while some military commanders have called for women to register as well, economists suggest that best course moving forward is to limit registration entirely.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Amid a debate over whether women should register for the draft, some economists call for an end to the system entirely.
lead_paragraph: Amid a debate over whether women should register for the draft, some economists call for an end to the system entirely.
